data.name: MailContainer
data.value:
<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Strict//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd">

 <style type="text/css">
        a {
            text-decoration: none !important;
        }

        .ExternalClass {
            width: 100%;
        }

        .ExternalClass,
        .ExternalClass p,
        .ExternalClass span,
        .ExternalClass font,
        .ExternalClass td,
        .ExternalClass div {
            line-height: 100%;
        }

        body {
            -webkit-text-size-adjust: none;
            -ms-text-size-adjust: none;
            
        }

        body {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
        }

        table td {
            border-collapse: collapse;
        }

        .view_button {
            display: none !important;
        }

        @media screen and (min-width: 481px) {
            .d_margintop0 {
                margin-top: 0px !important
            }
        }

<body style="direction: [%BodyDirection%];">
    <table class="m_bg_white" width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
        <tr>
            <td class="m_wb m_pt0" width="850" align="center" style="padding-top:20px">
                <table class="m_wb m_b0" height="40" width="850" align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0"
                    cellspacing="0" style="background-color:#ffffff">
                    <tr>
                        <td class="m_wc m_pl m_pr m_pt20 m_pb15" width="850" align="center"
                            style="padding:30px 20px 20px 20px">
                            <table width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"
                                style="border-collapse:collapse;">
                                <tr>
                                    <td class="m_pb15 m_pt0" align="center" valign="bottom">
                                        <table class="m_wc" width="760">
                                            <tr>
                                                <td class="m_overflow200 m_fs21 m_lh23" align="center"
                                                    style="font-size:32px; line-height:36px;padding:0 0 0 0;font-family:helvetica neue,helvetica,arial,sans-serif;font-weight:bold;color:#444444;max-width:400px;overflow:hidden;text-overflow:ellipsis">
                                                    <img src="[%Image%]"
                                                      width="337" height="300">
                                                </td>
                                           
                                            </tr>
                                        </table>
                                    </td>
                                </tr>
                            </table>
                        </td>
                    </tr>
                </table>
            </td>
        </tr>
    </table>
	
    [%MessageBody%]
	
    <table class="m_bg_white" width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
        <tr>
            <td align="center">

                <table class="m_wb" width="850" align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"
                    style="background-color:#f7f7f7">
                    <tr>
                        <td class="m_wc m_pl m_pr" align="center" style="padding:0px 20px 0px 20px">
                            <table width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"
                                style="border-collapse:collapse;">
                                <tr>
                                    <td class="m_fs14 m_lh20 " valign="bottom"
                                        style="padding:20px 0px 0px 0px;font-family:helvetica neue,helvetica,arial,sans-serif;font-size:16px;line-height:20px;color:#444444">
                                     [%FollowUs%]

                                    </td>
                                </tr>
                            </table>
                            <table width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"
                                style="border-collapse:collapse;">
                                <tr>
                                    <td valign="bottom" height="30" style="padding:10px 0 10px 0">

                                        <a href="https://facebook.com/Bcareksa-115093535762889/" target="_blank">
                                            <img width="40" height="40" src="[%SiteURL%]/resources/imgs/SocialMedia/facebook.png"
                                                style="-ms-interpolation-mode:bicubic;text-decoration:none;display:inline;outline:none;">
                                        </a>

                                        <a href="http://instagram.com/bcareksa" target="_blank">
                                            <img width="40" height="40" src="[%SiteURL%]/resources/imgs/SocialMedia/instagram.png"
                                                style="-ms-interpolation-mode:bicubic;text-decoration:none;display:inline;outline:none;">
                                        </a>


                                        <a href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/bcareksa" target="_blank">
                                            <img width="40" height="40" src="[%SiteURL%]/resources/imgs/SocialMedia/linkedin.png"
                                                style="-ms-interpolation-mode:bicubic;text-decoration:none;display:inline;outline:none;">
                                        </a>

                                        <a href="https://twitter.com/bcareksa" target="_blank"> <img width="40"
                                                height="40" src="[%SiteURL%]/resources/imgs/SocialMedia/twitter.png"
                                                style="-ms-interpolation-mode:bicubic;text-decoration:none;display:inline;outline:none;" />
                                        </a>
                                    </td>
                                </tr>
                            </table>
                        </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                        <td class="m_wc m_pl m_pr" align="center">
                            <table width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"
                                style="border-collapse:collapse;">
                                <tr>
                                    <td class="m_fs14 m_lh20 " valign="bottom"
                                        style="padding:20px 20px 20px 20px;font-family:helvetica neue,helvetica,arial,sans-serif;font-size:16px;line-height:20px;color:#444444">
										
                                        [%VisitUs%]

                                    </td>
                                </tr>
                            </table>
                        </td>
                    </tr>
                </table>
            </td>
        </tr>
    </table>
</body>
</html>
